summary: Convert prices between currencies.

summary: Load and publish datasets from a DBpedia databus service.

summary: Send queries to a GraphQL endpoint and save the results in a JSON dataset.

summary: Create unique IRDIs

summary: Send and receive messages from Apache Kafka.

summary: Import dataset resources from Kaggle.

summary: Loop over the output of a task and start a sub-workflow for each entity.

summary: Send messages to Mattermost channels and users.

summary: Convert numbers between binary, octal, decimal and hexadecimal representation.

name: cmem-plugin-parameters
summary: Set or overwrite parameters of a task.

summary: Validate your Knowledge Graphs based on tests generated from SHACL shapes.

summary: Write ad-hoc transformations and workflow tasks with Python.

summary: Query anything with SPARQL to construct Knowledge Graphs.

name: cmem-plugin-splitfile
summary: Split a text file into parts of the same filesize

summary: Validate graph and data structures.
